file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 74-21-01-04 - IGNITERS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL IGNITERS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/Install the igniters. B. These procedures are applicable to the LH and RH engines. C. Each engine has two igniters. One igniter on the top, and the other on the bottom of the engine. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 74-21-01-000-801-A IGNITER - REMOVAL ALL 74-21-01-400-801-A IGNITER - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 74-21-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 74-21-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. IGNITER - REMOVAL A. General (1) To remove the igniter, obey the instructions given in the latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower cowling LH engine 423 Lower cowling RH engine 414 Upper cowling LH engine 424 Upper cowling RH engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THE ENGINE START/STOP SWITCH IS IN THE “STOP” POSITION TO PREVENT AN ACCIDENTAL ENGINE OPERATION. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 74-21-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – POWERPLANT START 1/2. (2) For removal/installation of the bottom igniter, open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400). (3) For removal/installation of the top igniter, remove the upper cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A WARNING: THE IGNITION SYSTEM VOLTAGE IS DANGEROUSLY HIGH AND CAN KILL OR CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS. MAKE SURE THAT THE IGNITION SYSTEM IS SET TO OFF FOR A MINIMUM OF SIX (6) MINUTES, BEFORE YOU START THE WORK ON THE IGNITION SYSTEM COMPONENTS. (1) Remove the igniter. Refer to the latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 74-21-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 74-21-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. IGNITER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To install the igniter, obey the instructions in the latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower cowling LH engine 423 Lower cowling RH engine 414 Upper cowling LH engine 424 Upper cowling RH engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine work area I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the igniter. Refer to the latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 74-21-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the upper cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400) if applicable. (2) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). (3) Remove the workstand. (4) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close the applicable circuit breakers. • POWERPLANT START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 74-21-01 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
